definitions.usage_example: Put on your jacket. It's cold outside.
definitions.alternative_example: Wear your jacket. It's cold outside.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ponte la chaqueta. Hace frío afuera.

definitions.usage_example: Can you put on some music?
He put on 10 pounds over the holidays.
definitions.alternative_example: He gained 10 pounds over the holidays.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él ganó 10 libras (kilos) durante las vacaciones.

definitions.usage_example: She wasn't really sad. She just put it on.
definitions.alternative_example: She wasn't really sad. She just pretended.
definitions.usage_example_es: No estaba realmente triste. Solo lo fingió.

definitions.usage_example: Never put off until tomorrow what you can do today.
definitions.alternative_example: Never postpone until tomorrow what you can do today.
definitions.usage_example_es: Nunca dejes para mañana lo que puedes hacer hoy.

definitions.usage_example: The bad smell put me off the food.
definitions.alternative_example: The bad smell discouraged me from eating the food.
definitions.usage_example_es: El mal olor me quitó las ganas de comer.

definitions.usage_example: The firefighters put out the fire quickly.
definitions.alternative_example: The firefighters extinguished the fire quickly.
definitions.usage_example_es: Los bomberos apagaron el fuego rápidamente.

definitions.usage_example: Don't forget to put out the trash.
definitions.alternative_example: Don't forget to take the trash outside.

definitions.usage_example: I can't put up with his excuses anymore.
definitions.alternative_example: I can't tolerate his excuses anymore.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ya no puedo soportar sus excusas.

definitions.usage_example: Please put away your toys now.
definitions.alternative_example: Please store your toys in their proper place.
definitions.usage_example_es: Por favor, guarda tus juguetes ahora.

definitions.usage_example: You can put down your bag here.
definitions.alternative_example: You can place your bag here.

definitions.usage_example: He always puts down his coworkers.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él siempre menosprecia a sus compañeros de trabajo.

definitions.usage_example: We had to put our old cat down.
definitions.alternative_example: We had to euthanize our old cat.
definitions.usage_example_es: Tuvimos que sacrificar a nuestro viejo gato.
